text: wqal almshrkwn: ma lhdha aldhy yazeum 'anah rasul allah (yenwn mhmdana salaa allah ealayh wslm) yakul altaeam mthlna, wayamshi fi al'aswaq litalab alrzq? fhla 'ursil allah maeah malakana yashhad ealaa sdqh, 'aw yahbit ealayh min alsama' kanz min mal, 'aw takun lah hadiqat ezymt yakul min thmrha, waqal hwla' alzaalimun almkdhbwn: ma tatabieun 'ayuha almuminun 'iilaa rajulana bih sihr ghalab ealaa eqlh
